channel.title: Dark Pulse [RECRUITING]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FPm5C.jpg[/img]
Let me explain what dark pulse is
dark pulse is going to be a good eco server , Quite fast xp rates , hard to get rares
Ingame pictures [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qfJ7I.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AZbfM.png[/img]
.....
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/abQkQ.jpg[/img]
just answer this simple sheet to join: [code] what Age you are: Role you want to be (gfx, coder, Web designer.....): How long you have been doing The above question (proof REQ): MSN or skype (must have 1): Why you want to join the Team: How offten you will be on: [/code]

item.title: Dark Pulse [RECRUITING]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

what Age you are: 15
Role you want to be (gfx, coder, Web designer…): coder
How long you have been doing The above question (proof REQ): 2 years, uh i made optimusscape 667 loading 711, and a couple old servers that arent released. Also, the server on the most popular list “Roxoscape” is a server i coded.
MSN or skype (must have 1): skype - roxofan17
Why you want to join the Team: I see potential in this server. I like it! well hope you accept me
How offten you will be on: 6 hours a day, and all day on weekends

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Pulse [RECRUITING]
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

What age you are: 14

Role you want to be (gfx, coder, Web designer…): Coder

How long you have been doing The above question (proof REQ): I have a server in development called, Project L.O.L (please download it and see it for yourself)

MSN or skype (must have 1): Skype

Why you want to join the Team: Your work looks so HD the graphics, tabs set-up, basicly it looks like you dont even need a Graphics Desinger.

How often you will be on: As long as i Want, Need to. (exept on saturday’s from 4:40-6:25 because of church)

item.title: Dark Pulse [RECRUITING]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If you wish to attract the attention of the more professional developers on here you will need to provide more information. This may include:

-more media of the server
-your objectives
-proof of what you have done yourself
-what you are offering for our work
-why we should choose your development?
-prerequisites

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Pulse [RECRUITING]
item.dc:creator: @EndlessKarma EndlessKarma
item.description:
@EndlessKarma wrote:

what Age you are: 20
Role you want to be (gfx, coder, Web designer…): I could host. possibly Web designer depending on what it is?
How long you have been doing The above question (proof REQ): I have Hosted one server, till the coder stopped. idk how to prove? but it was called Endless Karma.
MSN or skype (must have 1): I do have skype.
Why you want to join the Team: To help make a server that everyone wants to play. and be satifisfied with, aswell as myself and other staff.
How offten you will be on: I am online very often, i get ppl who say “Ace do u never sleep?” which Ace is my ingame name…lol so yea.
